overview:
President, CEO and founder of Etuda.com. a new platform for collaborative education and knowledge exchange.

Senior executive and consultant with 20 years of experience and accomplishments in the areas of eduction, business development, project management, strategy, marketing, operations, and professional services.

Currently and Assistant Professor at Colorado Technical University online and an Adjunct Instrutor at University of Phoenix Online and Ashford University.

Co-founded one of the first Internet Security practices in the US at KPMG and was one of the leaders of the ECommerce and Security practice at E&Y in San Francisco. COO at an Internet services company and was President and CEO of consulting firm Productivity Partners. Skilled in most aspects of start-up ventures from planning to marketing.
